hero.p: Download FingeRate app now! Take quick surveys, share your thoughts, and start earning amazing rewards! Your opinion matter, and so do the rewards – it's that simple! Let your voice count and your earnings grow!

features: Create your account, take surveys, and watch those points add up. Say goodbye to waiting – it's all about instant joy when you trade your points for exclusive coupons. Get ready to treat yourself!
FingeRate App Screenshot of getting rewarded for survey participation
Collect mileage, snag cool coupons, and deck out your avatar in style! Trade your SoM for amazing rewards and epic accessories - your opinion, your style, your rewards!
FingeRate App Screenshot of My Wallet page, showing amount of SoM points and coupons
Our app prioritizes security and privacy. We have carefully developed it using the latest technology to ensure an unmatched level of protection for your data.

section-1.p-1: MSOT Token is directly used to navigate the FingeRate Ecosystem. It provides users with various rewards, while creating a world of opportunities.
section-1.p-2: It is built on a secure and transparent blockchain network, ensuring that the best functionalities are available to users while maintaining a high level of security and trust.

section-2.p-1: Are you ready to be a part of something big? Join our vibrant community on X and Telegram (but not only!) and become a driving force behind the success of FingeRate!
section-2.p-2: Stay updated with the latest developments, share your ideas, and connect with like-minded individuals who share your passion for innovation and new technologies!

roadmap.p: Witness the evolution of our ecosystem through game-changing upgrades and tailored functionalities, as we push the boundaries to deliver an unparalleled experience for our users.
2021: Designed the web and Metaverse platform
Mined 1,000 virtual bots and uploaded them on OpenSea MarketPlace
Token Swap from BTour to MSOT
2022: FingeRate app 2.0 development design and planning
Planning for FingeRate Bot advanced version development
2023: Official rebranding of FingeRate from BTour Chain
FingeRate app official launch in South Korea targeting local market
Upgraded version of FingeRate Bot with improved AI and data accuracy
2024: Wallet, block explorer, and dApp functionalities to strengthen the blockchain ecosystem
Development of AI deep research services for FR Bot
FingeRate app official launch on the global market
FingeRate Bot compatibility with all kinds of kiosks / digital displays
2025: AI capabilities for deep research services
Fully automated generation of reports that analyze survey data

hero.p: Meet the people behind FingeRate and its unique ecosystem!

core.p: We bring a wealth of experience, all sprinkled with passion

history.p-1: Back in 2019, our founders Seung-soo Han and Young-kun Kim noticed that there was a need for solutions that would facilitate data gathering in the tourist sector. Within a few months, the passionate team brought to life the first FingeRate Bot.
history.p-2: The team recognized the need for a digital solution to assist business communities with key insights, directly from people stuck at home. This led to the development of the FingeRate app and the subsequent expansion of our ecosystem.
history.p-3: Today, the FingeRate ecosystem is reaching new heights with over 10,000 downloads on iOS and Android, a stable coin, and several FingeRate Bots dotted all over South Korea.

q&a: What are SoMs? How does it work?

<0>SoM is the in-app mileage that serves as the currency within the FingeRate app. It allows users to purchase items from the Marketplace, pay for survey registration, and eventually convert SoMs to MSOT tokens to withdraw as money.</0><1>The exchange rate is 1 SoM = $0.1</1><2>NB: Earned SoMs expire in 6 months</2>
How do I get started? How to Sign up?
<0>Getting started with FingeRate is simple! Register directly on the app using your email, Kakao, or Naver account.</0>
What do you do with my survey responses?
<0>We analyze participants’ responses and share the results with the survey requester. The analyzed results are also accessible on the FingeRate app.</0>
What is S2E?

<0>S2E, or Survey to Earn, allows users to earn rewards by participating in surveys. It provides a platform for individuals to share their opinions and insights on various topics in exchange for compensation.</0>
How can I earn SoMs?

<0>Earning SoMs is simple:</0><1><2>Enter your additional information (one time)</2><3>Use your referral code to invite your friends</3><4>Participate in surveys</4><5>Complete the daily attendance check</5><6>Daily survey participation check</6></1><7>NB: Earned SoMs expire in 6 months</7>
What can I do with my SoMs?

<0>Users can use their SoMs for various purposes:</0><1><2>Purchasing avatar accessories from Marketplace</2><3>Paying for survey registration</3><4>Swapping SoMs with MSOT tokens</4><5>Buying rewards/coupons from the Marketplace (coming soon!)</5></1><6>NB: 1SoM=$0.1 Earned SoMs expire in 6 months</6>
How do I purchase additional SoMs?
<0>Users can purchase SoMs using their credit cards from the FingeRate app. Simply go to “Wallet,” click “Recharge”, and follow the provided steps.</0>
What rewards can I get by answering your surveys?

<0>Users can earn SoMs – the in-app mileage that serves as the currency within the FingeRate app. It allows users to purchase items from the Marketplace, pay for survey registration, and eventually convert SoMs to MSOT tokens to withdraw as money.</0>
Who is behind FingeRate?
<0>GG56 is the driving force behind the development and maintenance of FingeRate and its associated ecosystem. For more information, <1>visit the official website</1>.</0>
Can I create my own survey?

<0>Yes! Users can create and manage their own surveys directly from FingeRate app through these simple steps:</0><1><2>Go to the “Survey” tab</2><3>Choose the survey type</3><4>Determine the number of SoTs and survey duration</4><5>Decide on the number of participants you want for your survey. You can choose a specific limit or leave it open-ended.</5><6>Add your survey questions</6><7>Pay using SoMs!</7></1>
How can I join the community?
<0>Follow us on our social media platform: <1>Instagram</1>, <2>Facebook</2>, <3>X</3>, <4>Telegram</4>, and <5>LinkedIn</5>!</0>
What platform is FingeRate available on?
<0>FingeRate is available on <1>iOS</1> and <2>Android</2>!</0>
Who can I contact for press inquiries?
<0>For press inquiries, please contact us directly at <1>marc6@gg56.world</1> or use the <2>contact form</2> on our website.</0>
How do you handle security?

<0>We have implemented robust measures to prioritize the security of your information. Our secure infrastructure, industry-standard protocols, and encryption techniques safeguard your data during transmission and storage. Access controls are designed and regularly monitored to restrict unauthorized access. Whenever possible, we anonymize and aggregate data to protect individual identities. We are committed to complying with data protection and privacy regulations like GDPR and strive to meet legal requirements for data processing, storage, and sharing.</0><1>For more detailed information, please refer to our <2>Privacy Policy</2> and <3>Terms of Use</3> on our website.</1><4>Please don't hesitate to contact us for further inquiries or concerns regarding data protection.</4>
